text: Mohammed Al-Rasheedi is a member of the Kuwaiti National Assembly, representing the fourth district. Born in 1964, Dr. Al-Rasheedi obtained a PhD in law and worked in education training before being elected to the National Assembly in 2008. While political parties are technically illegal in Kuwait, Al-Rasheedi affiliates with the Islamist deputies. He is a member of the Al- Rashaydah tribe.Arab Times MP Profile ==References== Category:Kuwaiti people of Arab descent Category:Members of the National Assembly of Kuwait Category:Living people Category:1964 births
title: Mohammed Al-Rasheedi
